snippet.title: Hunter's Legacy - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Hunter's Legacy available on January 24th on PlayStation 4
Website: www.lienzo.mx/hunterslegacy

Embark on a challenging quest with the Great Huntress of Un'Amak! Hunter's Legacy is a 2D Metroidvania platformer starring Ikki, a fierce cat who must save the Kingdom of Iripur from the evil Morodir.

The game features a non-lineal design where the focus is on exploration and combat in an open world filled with different characters, enemies, and collectibles.

http://www.lienzo.mx/hunterslegacy

Lienzo All rights reserved
